test.instr: (:ins (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X green) (sort Y cupboard) (type Y container))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X red))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X blue) (sort Y cupboard) (type Y container))) (:cons_notnot (:info (on X Y) (:cond (color X red) (sort X can) (sort Y sofa)))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X green) (sort Y refrigerator) (type Y container))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X white) (sort Y bed))) )
test.nl: Take out the green can from cupboard. Pick up the red remotecontrol. Put the blue book in cupboard. The red can must be on sofa. Put the green cup in the refrigerator. Put the white remotecontrol on the sofa.
